Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Camera for Model RC Airplane-ing
Reviews.Author: UncleCalli
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera (Mini DV MD80 DVR Video Camera) for our son this past Christmas with the hopes that it could be mounted to his model RC airplanes.  It was a gamble, but for the price (we paid around $15 w/memory card) it was a gable worth taking.  This little video camera has turned out to be a fabulous addition to his model airplaning experience.  We were able to very easily mount the camera clips (provided) to the underside of the airplanes with some heavy duty Velcro - and it works out great.The Good:* Price - we paid only $15!* This camera takes fair, not great video.  But for the price it took far better video than I was expecting.  Plenty good enough for my son's hobby needs.* It is small and light.  About the size of two stacked USB thumb drives and weighs only a bit more due to integrated battery.* Charges over USB.* Standard mini USB plug.  No need for a special cable.* Included a wide variety of mounting clips and brackets.  Enough to meet our needs.* Includes a lanyard and lanyard clip right on the camera.  This is great for our needs as we tie the lanyard to the planes as a back if the mounting bracket gives way during flight.* Removable/replaceable memory (standard MicroSD).  This is very handy for a long day out at the air fields - when one gets full we simply drop in another memory card.* Acts as a mass storage device.  Thus no drivers needed on your computer and simple file copies are all that is needed for video file management.* Comes with rechargeable batteryThe Bad:* No display screen.  This turns out to be a good thing for us, as a screen only adds to its size and weight.  But for some this might be a pain as you must down load your video to a computer to view it.* Controls are a bit cramped and confusing to understand how to use.  But that is expected for something so small and for its price.* No zoom.  But what do you expect for $15?  That said the current angle of the view is pretty good for our needs.  If you desire a zoon this is not the camera for you.* Battery is fully integrated and non-replaceable.  But that is expected for this price point.  Even if it were replaceable the replacement would surely cost more than the $15 I paid for it.The Ugly:* The video contains embedded date/time in the lower right hand corner of the video.  I can't figure out how to get rid of it.  It took me many hours on the internet just to figure out how to get the date/time set accurately.  I am not a dumb guy when it comes to tech related things but this was a royal pitb to figure out.  Most of the ways called out online did not work.* The documentation is horrid.  I had to spend a few hours with the internet to figure out how to configure this thing.  I don't care how cheap it is - it doesn't cost much to print some documentation or at least print the URL to where good documentation can be found online.Conclusion:This is a great little camera for our needs and the price.  If you are looking for something small and self-contained that takes decent video for an unbelievable price this is camera for you.  I'm giving it four stars due to the difficulties for configuring the date/time and poor documentation.

Reviews.Title: WOW - A Dream Come True
Reviews.Author: J. Smith "scientist"
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with this little unit.  It puts out really good video for its size.  It is by no means so small that you can place this unit anywhere and no one will notice, but it is small enough to be missed by most people.  The unit works well, but it is difficult to press the little bitty buttons with big honking fingers.  You will get into the habit of using some form of stylus to turn the unit on and get it recording.  It also took me a little practice to understand what the blinking lights mean - am I recording or not?  In the end, there is no limit to what I want to do with this unit.  Now, if only I can find the time to use it like I want to.  I have used this unit to record golf swings for further analysis (its small enough to fit in a golf bag pocket and to be used without making the subject totally uncomfortable), recording helmet video from my daily bicycle ride (attached by Velcro to my helmet), and as a dash cam for my car (attached by Velcro to the back of my rear view mirror - pointing forward) to record idiots and trash throwers.  I did quickly break the spring loaded clip provided, but find Velcro is a more stable means of attachment.This is a great unit for use where a full size video cam will be in the way.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after first time it was used...
Reviews.Author: Johnathan L Duemmer
Reviews.Content: Very cheap. Only worked one time for 10 minutes. Its was inexpensive so i will not waste my time returning it but maybe thats what they were hoping for. I

Reviews.Title: MD80 Clone. You can not beat it for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jason Underwood

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3EXRMUEY45WE5currentClick) { return cv_mo3EXRMUEY45WE5currentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:40 MinsThis is a 480p @ 30FPS camera.First thing you want to do is charge the unit (at least a full 3 hours), do not plug it into a computer, try using a cell charger that has a USB plug (It's faster).Hold power for 3 secs, then press once on the top button to start recording video, again to stop. If you do nothing after turning it on it will shut its self off after 10 secs.To set the time, create at a .txt file called TAG the format is this YYYY/MM/DD 24: 00: 00. Save this file to the TF card (MicroSD) and go into property's by right clicking, un-check archive, then click save/accept/ok. turn the unit off, then on, take a test video. Connect to the computer, open the file, at the bottom the time stamp should be correct. You can change the time stamp anytime by following the steps above. No you can not remove the time stamp, but it's good to have if you use it to provide evidence in court.--==[ Edited ]==-- 12-10-2013Addition, added short video clip from camera. This is a short video from when I left the recorder on inside a vehicle.--==[ Edited ]==-- 02-17-2014I just noticed the video I uploaded is bad, Amazon must have an issue with there encoding. I can tell you that the video and audio do NOT look and sound that way. My only guess is the conversion over to the format Amazon uses maybe corrupted the file.

Reviews.Title: No SD card
Reviews.Author: andrewski
Reviews.Content: The camera itself works quite well for the price.  Video quality was surprisingly good, and the camera is very small.  Was easy enough to use despite the bad manual...put in SD card, push power, push the top record button.  Didn't have any trouble at all with that on either of the two units I ordered.  Flew them to 85,000 feet on a high altitude balloon and they worked flawlessly.However, I ordered two and neither came with a micro SD card as advertised.  Amazon did issue a return authorization, but I needed the cameras sooner than I could have gotten a replacement, so ended up purchasing my own SD cards.  Advice would be to buy the camera only (it's a few bucks cheaper) and get your own SD cards.  Still weren't bad cameras for what I paid, but was inconvenient not to have the SD cards.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Gary Knotts
Reviews.Content: We now have at least 5 of these cameras used by our campus safety dept. well worth the price as they have really cutdown on the "he said/she said" problems that occur between security and students. Great asset when when used properly.

Reviews.Title: Worked well for my purposes
Reviews.Author: nstinson
Reviews.Content: I thought that it took very good video for the price and purposes I got it for.The only drawback is that it is difficult to see where you are aiming it at times

Reviews.Title: Wish it had a better clip
Reviews.Author: Heichihua "Chihuahua"
Reviews.Content: It definitely does what it advertises. Its very simplistic and the clip isn't that great but glued it into the clip system and does fine now. The footage isn't half bad. Can't beat the price so hard to complain about the quality.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work out of the box
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: When I received it , it wouldn't take a charge.Swapped usb cords and it took a charge but didn't stop charging as instructions showed. Tried the buttons and they didn't do anything either.Took it apart and found there was not enough foam behind the circuit board to align the switches with the buttons.Added foam behind the board and everything worked.For the price I guess it is what you would expect.Wasn't worth sending back so i tinkered with it. They might consider selling these in a gumball machine for $.50 !

Reviews.Title: Works great, but warning: no SD card!
Reviews.Author: Bob Sacamano
Reviews.Content: The camera does NOT come with an micro SD card as it said (and if it did, it was too small for me to find it).Other than that minor problem (I already have a Micro SD card) it works perfectly as advertised.It comes with a holder clip, which can attach to another small holder, one with a plate on the back. This has a light magnet in it, but it's very weak, so don't count on using it alone to support the camera. Also, I found, when attached to this plate and set down, the camera cannot point perpendicular to the plate. Annoying if you need to record parallel to the ground (I didn't).I didn't get any of the problems these other people seem to have had. Works great for what I'm trying to do, recording water rocket flights from in-rocket.

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money for Something to Play Around With
Reviews.Author: Brodave "Brodave"
Reviews.Content: Worth the Money for Something to Play Around With.  It works, but is not really practical.  I think it is a fun thing to check out, and I know I haven't figured out how to use it fully yet, but it's worth what little I paid for it.I gave it 4 stars.  I couldn't give it a higher rating, because it didn't work at all when I got it.  I took out the 4 screws holding it together, and saw that the battery was keeping the circuit board from aligning with the holes for the controls properly, so I cut a piece of the cardboard package it came in to put pressure on the board.  It now works, but restarts every 10 minutes.  I don't know why, unless it's to make it compatible with some antiquated computer.

Reviews.Title: as advertised, 720 is concidered hd, like TVs sold as hd
Reviews.Author: lestergardner
Reviews.Content: crisp, wide vid & sound, charges quick, ease of use, no complaints whatsoever, very small product, care is a must. took chance over complaints( there different ones/models/supplyers), mine grey black is beutifull

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: zavairavincent
Reviews.Content: just as item discribes. works wonderfully. came on time, charger works. Just was looking for a dash/spy cam in case i was in an accedent or stoped by an ass whole cop.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Observer
Reviews.Content: The device works and you get what you pay for. Its small and works great if you keep it stationary, but if you plan on taking it on the move I would suggest buying a higher end model. You can't beat the price though and that's why I gave it 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: intriguing but not rugged, not dependable
Reviews.Author: quite caucasian
Reviews.Content: Wellp, I bought this same unit from an even cheaper vendor and it lasted about one month.  When it worked it was surprisingly good, performance-wise, then one day - all of the indicator lights were lit, but no button or control could shut it off.  Would not show up when plugged into USB port and would not record.  Oh, well - I guess its a disposable DVD recorder.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: So, the recorder itself is not too bad.  Do not expect stellar results, but for $15 its really not to bad.  Records fine and has decent sound.  Difficult to actual record what you are attempting to record since there is no view finder.  Seller did not supply numerous items that were listed ( 4GB SD card, original packaging, CD) but everything else was present.  Honestly, if the price seems reasonable to you, the device functions as promised and is fairly user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Used for aerial video (RC airplane)
Reviews.Author: Pathfinder
Reviews.Content: I use it attached to RC airplanes for aerial video.Impressive quality for the money.  Its spent hours at 400+ feet above my neighborhood.Its not water proof as I found out after a crash into the lake.However, after taking apart, drying it out, it's been back up recording on many flights.Only complaint, the power button partially detached from the circuit board. After taking apart again and applying a dab of hot glue, its back in action.

Reviews.Title: Quality Control must be drunk at the factory
Reviews.Author: Charles Beatty
Reviews.Content: I received the camera pretty quick.  I was impressed it came with so many accessories and even a 4GB SD card.  However, it quickly rained on my parade as a did a quick visual assessment of the camera - the small lens assembly was not only decentered such that the unit housing interfered with the optics, but there was obviously signs of someone taking a sharp instrument (nail, paperclip, knife?) and trying to re-center the lens/camera in the housing.  They not only did not succeed, but the managed to put a nice gouge in the camera lens.  (Spoiler - the camera lens is plastic, about 2mm across)  So, the unit was useless.Amazon was great in allowing UPS to pick up the unit at my front door and issue a refund...but what a bummer.  Cheap as cheap can be.  Must be pretty drunk, tired and/or over-worked at the Chinese factory.

Reviews.Title: Mini DV MD80 Video Camera Junk
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Jensen
Reviews.Content: Useless junk does not work. Save your money do not waste your time or money on this item.I buy from Amazon because  the products are good. This is  a waste of time, and moneyHad  a IT tech. try to make it work no luck he has a master's  degree in electrical engineering  and his own IT company His conclusion (Just Junk)

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Shawn D Koga
Reviews.Content: Paid a cheap price to get a very cheap and barely functional product. Bought 2, one wont hold a charge and the other wont let me access the memory....lesson learned!

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Rluky3
Reviews.Content: This was not even worth the money I paid for it. It didn't last a day of use and the card slot is not aligned

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: Robert Miller
Reviews.Content: Did not work at all right out of the box. Probably didn't work because it was at least 7 years old so the lithium polymer bateries would not take a charge. Software was 9 years old. All in all a worthless product.

Reviews.Title: Save your $$$
Reviews.Author: david lessard
Reviews.Content: I didnt even get to use it before it broke. I pushed the power button an thats all it took to break it. Mine was just a piece of cheap plastic junk. I wish you luck if you buy one.

Reviews.Title: I don't like this.
Reviews.Author: D. Lye "DL"
Reviews.Content: cheap and it shows.Image and video quality is low.worse still, the angle is too narrow for any useful purposes.I've ditched them!

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good BUT...
Reviews.Author: Bob Tobias "Robert Tobias"
Reviews.Content: I previously tried several of the atrocious Veho Muvi Pro Micro DV Camcorder and wasn't expecting much better with this camera.  (See my review of the Veho and you'll know what I mean by atrocious.)Was I (pleasantly) surprised!I bought a couple of these and found that the video and sound were outstanding.  OK, "outstanding" for something so inexpensive and still pretty darn good for something costing several times more.The only problem I had was the sound activation.  It works but needs a very loud noise to get the recorder to start.  (To get sound activation to work you turn on the recorder, DO NOT press the record button, and DO press the "Mode" button.  The red and blue lights will flash rapidly.  When the recorder detects a sound it will start to record and the light will flash less rapidly.  After a couple minutes of silence the camera stops recording and the light go back to flashing rapidly, waiting for the next sound to start the camera recording again.)The only real problem is that, contrary to the title in the product listing, neither order included the 4GB MicroSD card.  Maybe I was unlucky both times and I still think this is a 5-star value.  However, it would be nice if Amazon (in this case the independent seller) included everything they were advertising.Usage Tips: - Inserting a Micro SD card can be a bit tricky and here's the trick.  If you look closely at the slot it appears to be divided in half, longways by a thin metal divider.  Holding the camera lengthwise with the lens pointing upward, the Micro SD card goes ABOVE the divider with the metal conductors facing upward.  After you get the card pushed in you need to slide it sideways slightly to get the latching tab to hold.  The good news is you only need to do this once and can leave the card in the camera.  In fact, if you are lucky enough to get a camera that already had the promised card installed then you don't need to do it at all. - Setting the Date/Time stamp can be frustrating.  There are lots of detailed YouTube videos that provide detailed instructions that didn't come close to working for me.  Here is what did.  You create a .TXT file on the MicroSD card named TAG.TXT.  It needs to be at the top level of the card, not in any folders.  The file contains ONE LINE and specifies the date and time you want to use for setting the camera's internal clock.  For example, pretend it is just before 1 AM on March 22, 2014.  Then the file would contain:2014-03-22 00:58:59There is a space but not a carriage return (newline for the kids) following the final '9'.  That worked for me... sort of.  It got the time stamps written onto the videos set properly. - Turning off the Time and Date stamp... You can't - Using an SD card that is larger than 16 GB... Just plug it in.  At least for me they work fine.BTW, I feel that honest, effective reviews can take the place of first-hand experiences that are lacking in online shopping. I've always appreciated the help I've received from other reviewers and work hard to return the favor as best as I can. I hope you found this review helpful and if there was anything you thought was missing or unclear leave a comment and I'll do what I can to fix it.

Reviews.Title: It's a good cheap light weight camera.
Reviews.Author: K. Fizz "Eclectically eclectic."
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use with RC helicopters and planes.  The main appeal was price and the fact that there were no buttons the back or front so mounting will be a breeze (see the end of the review for more on that).The video is great considering the resolution...what I mean is...it's only 720x480 which is a FAR cry from HD but I knew the resolution when I bought it and it's what I expected.  But I have to ding it a star for 3 reasons:#1.  There is no 4gb card like the title says.  It DOES say in the description that a card is not included and after reading reviews I didn't expect one so I bought a cheap 8G sandisk to go with it.  But ding for a bad title!#2.  The instructions are crap--poorly translated and out dated.  No disc for drivers like the instruction state, etc.  Ding 2.#3.  The sd card slot sucks.  On my second insertion of the card I missed the internal slot and jammed it into the device.  It took some careful paper clip surgery to get it out.  Ding 3.But not all is lost.  It appears there have been some nice firmware updates so a disk is not needed AT ALL.  But you can't follow the instructions to set the time and such so let me tell you what I did on my Windows 7 PC.1. Put the memory card in the camera.  DO NOT FORCE IT...if it's not going in it's probably upside down.  The metal contacts should be pointing it the same direction as the lens.  Make sure you get it into the slot and not above it or you'll need to dig it out with something.2. Hook it up to your PC's USB port (I used a 2.0 port).3. Use your PC to format the card..I didn't take any chances.4. Let it charge a bit.6. Remove the USB plug.7. Click power.  Wait a few seconds for the red light to flash.  Click Record (on the top).  Record a bit.  Click Record again to stop.  Wait a few seconds until it's back to all blue.8. Plug it back into your PC.9. Open up explorer and look for TAG.TXT in the root directory (D: for me) and double-click to open it in notepad.10. Change the date and time to the current date and time in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format (all on one line just like the existing date in the file) and save/close the file.11.  Repeat steps 6-8 (to record a new video).12.  From now on IGNORE TAG.TXT (it will be overwritten again, just do nothing with it).  There should be two avi files in DCIM\100MEDIA.  One with a bad date, and one with a good one.From this point on the date/time should be good.  HOWEVER, I'm not sure what will happen if the battery goes completely dry, you may have to edit the text file again.As for using this with Skype or some other web cam...again...you do NOT need a disk like the instructions state..atleast not with Windows 7 which is what I used.  Just turn the power on on the camera WHILE IT'S PLUGGED IN and it will go from charge/drive mode to live camera.  In other words you won't see the drive in explorer any more.  Also make sure there is a TF (microSD) card in the device even though you technically don't need it.Well that's it.  Now go burn the instructions in effigy because it's crap.  Ok...not completely since the pictures are good and the information about sound mode and what the lights mean are important, but in terms of setup it's crap.After all this I still need to give it 4 stars because technically it did what the specs said it did.  For using it with an RC product I highly recommend buying some stick-on velcro.  Put the one side on the back and front of the unit and the other side on as many RC devices in whatever angle you want so you can move it from device to device.  Once I can fly stuff without wrecking I'll buy a better camera and mount but for me and my 7 year this is perfect for now.  With my amazon prime account I paid under $19 for a low res camera, 8 Gig card and it was in my hand next day...I can't complain.  I also had to marvel at the fact that 8 gig of video fits on a card the size of my fingernail in a camera the size of my thumb and weighs less than a bag of chips.....Mmmmmm...chips....gotta go....

Reviews.Title: If there is a 0 star, I'd give it.
Reviews.Author: gduan2000
Reviews.Content: Received promptly through Amazon Prime. Plugged into computer with the USB cable came with, no lights at all. Plugged the USB to a charger, no lights. No 4 gb card. Other accessaries are ok, but without the DV, they are useless.It is going back.

Reviews.Title: Junk! Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: The camera is small and sleek just like a spy camera should look. During bright sunny days the video is great, but in low or typical indoor lighting the video is unrecognizable and grainy. Very difficult to point at anything you want to record, as there is no view finder and the lens is not lined up well. My camera had a defective microphone and you had to yell directly into the camera to record any kind of audio, even then the audio was muffled. I could not get the sound activated recording to work without blowing directly into the camera, I assume due to the bad microphone. The posts saying you can run it off USB power by holding down the record button while plugging the camera in, are wrong. It does switch out of mass storage/web cam mode, but even with external power it runs off the internal battery. I was able to set the correct date and time, but every time I turned the camera off and accessed the video(s) I recorded, the time and date would default back to the factory set time 4 years ago. I like many others did not received the Micro SD card, though the title implies a 4GB card comes with the camera. I returned this camera and decided to spend more for live feed surveillance cameras.

Reviews.Title: This never worked.
Reviews.Author: Erica Bradley
Reviews.Content: This never worked. It tried buy just failed, would not charge or come on when plugged in... Ended up in the garbage. Before you say well its just user error... I have worked in IT 20+ years and I always RTFM. Was told I would get a refund but never seen it. Not worth the time.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: the video horriblecould not use itwould point it at an object several feet away and it would be stuck zoomed incould not even use the images or the recordings

Reviews.Title: No SD Card / stopped working
Reviews.Author: John W. Herndon "John"
Reviews.Content: It did not come with the 4gb Microsd card, the listing is deceptive, "Camera W/4gb Microsd" and leads the purchaser to believe that there is a sd card included. It worked for about  30 mins then wouldn't work anymore. Thought the battery was dead; it wouldn't recharge. Another lesson of "you get what you pay for".

Reviews.Title: Has worked great..
Reviews.Author: Fred J. Morgan "Jeff Morgan"
Reviews.Content: Accidentally got dropped in sink with dishes.. found after washing.. dried out and still working.. true 720p Video is excellent check out a few in YouTube: "MD80 CAMERA" ... I Ordered another. Comes with many mounts and accessories...  Instructions SUCK but I managed OK... I re-wrote the instructions but Amazon will not show link..  search MD80 camera instructions.

Reviews.Title: Mini DV
Reviews.Author: Brandy H
Reviews.Content: The camera itself was pretty handy, but the clips are something to be cautious of, they break very easy and screws loosen.

Reviews.Title: I used 0 times since i bought it. Does not charge, does not work. Dont recommend buying it.
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Battery never charged, never got to use it at all. I have it brand new trying to charge. Planing on buy it, dont move on to a different brand or product.

Reviews.Title: IF YOU HAVE MONEY TO "BURN", THIS IS THE PEFECT CONTRAPTION TO PURCHASE!!!
Reviews.Author: BLESS THEE "Manahuna"
Reviews.Content: Whether Good OR Bad, this product is definitely "TERRIBLE" at best!!1)  You have to also buy a memory card, $10-$20.2)  Instructions was written in retarded-english(somewhat a drunken language from China).3)  Sound & Video was lame at best.4)  You have no idea if the buttons are actually doing what it suppose to be doing, lmfao!!5)  It's not even worth sending it back( WASTE OF HARD EARNED CASH )!!End result:  I kept the memory card, than SLEDGE HAMMERED THE PLASTIC CRAP INTO THE NEXT NIGHTMARE!!

Reviews.Title: EOW
Reviews.Author: Shawn G.
Reviews.Content: Clip broke second I took it out the package. Randomly shuts off. Battery last random amounts of time. Sometimes it last hours sometimes it shuts off within a half hour. Does take pretty good quality film and audio for the price though.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Scotty
Reviews.Content: From straight out of the package, the Mini DV MD80 DVR video did not work at all.  You must buy a micro SD card which is an additional $10 to $20.  A total waste of money.  Would cost more to return it, then just to suck up the loss.  Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby for a clone. I'm happy :)
Reviews.Author: DaPirate
Reviews.Content: It arrived days before I expected it which was awesome. Didn't come with a box or packaging, it was in a worn out ziplock sandwich bag that looked like it was used for someones lunch. No software, and the instructions are very badly translated from Chinese. Although the battery only lasts 40 minutes and its super fragile, it does shoot good video. Operation is simple, hold power to turn on, hit top button to record (auto segments video into 10 minute clips) and press mode to turn on sound activated recording. Blue led is stand by, blue and slow blinking red is recording, and blue with rapid blinking red means its sound record ready. Auto saves video before low battery shut down so no corrupted video loss. Timestamp is a pain to set, it can't be turned off either.Clip and stand are almost worthless and will break as soon as you use them. Came with a 4gb sd mini card and sd adapter, but no charger just a usb cable. Any 5 volt usb cellphone charger will work. All in all it was worth the price, I might even order another just for backup.

Reviews.Title: MD80 D001
Reviews.Author: ait2083151
Reviews.Content: First of all I was impressed how fast I received my product.  Secondly I was even more impressed with the video quality. Now I will be completely honest the video does not do good in low light now with that said during a full sunlight and outdoors it is great.  I have seen some negative comments, but remember it is not a high quality camera it does what it says it does and I am impressed. I will definitely be ordering another one soon. Oh mine did not come with the micro sd card :-( that is the only gripe that I have.

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: Taylor J.
Reviews.Content: this is a fun toy, i can record pretty much every thing with out anyone noticing but it does have pretty bad video quality

Reviews.Title: Junk, record a file but no video player can player can play it.
Reviews.Author: Zhihong
Reviews.Content: Even though the camera is very low quality as I expected but I still hope it would work. But it didn't. I recorded some video but no player can play it, all tell me unrecognized file format. I tried QuickTime on Mac, Windows Media Player on Windows 7, VLC on both Mac and Windows.The shipping was fast and it did come with lots of accessories.

Reviews.Title: my review
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Haltom
Reviews.Content: like it very well its small compact..works great in small areas and  in  big  areas  im very happy thank you

Reviews.Title: NO micro SD card
Reviews.Author: Lwin
Reviews.Content: Title said mini dv md80 dvr video camera w/4gb micro sdcard! When I opened it there wasn't micro sd card! It is just a lie to buy this product by sneaky! This is not nice at all! I will never buy from this seller again, ever! Don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: Buyer be fraged
Reviews.Author: John Kerr
Reviews.Content: This product shipped and when opened was in a sandwich bag. I said who cares as long as it works. I followed the directions as best I could but the item did not match the manual in function or even lights color. The product would not stay on or record video. Also after having to restart my computer each time I plug it in it disables my usb hub. The product is 100% defective and is damaging to system hardware. This is coming from a network admin with 20 years history working with computers. Do not buy !!!! it is a scam. How this got to be in the prime program is beyond me. This is the 3nd time I have had a bad experience with amazon out of 5... Amazon is no longer worth the time as a place to get things you need and plan to use.

Reviews.Title: It's cheap alright...
Reviews.Author: B. Green
Reviews.Content: I bought three. None of them worked. One of them would not even charge. One charged, but would not power on. The third one charged, powered on, but shut off after 10 minutes of recording and would not power back on. Sent them all back.

Reviews.Title: they stay true to thur word
Reviews.Author: meredith joe payne jr.
Reviews.Content: It is great haven't had one bit of trouble out of it so far it is awesome and I know I can trust any thing they sell me

Reviews.Title: Poor instructions
Reviews.Author: Charles Daniel Smith
Reviews.Content: The MD80 is junk!poor instructiions that are so small you can not read and they are not complete. I can not get it to charge. The instructions mention a green  ligh and there is not one.

Reviews.Title: Mini DV MD80 DVR Video Camera review
Reviews.Author: J A M
Reviews.Content: It would be 5 stars if the instructions were not a computer generated translation and if the clip attachment had an up and down adjustment rather than my being required to find some thing to attach to it to aim it properly.If the translation would work better to do it by putting the true English translation on a website and give us the URL that would be fine.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: Clint Kanester
Reviews.Content: Takes a bit of time to set the date, but lots of info on the internet on how to do so, as the direction sheet is not well written.  Great little product though, video is clear, and sound is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Webcam, but not reliable recorder
Reviews.Author: David Wamsley
Reviews.Content: Once I start "recording" with the device, then try to "stop" the recording by pushing the start/stop button, there is no change in the flashing red light, indicating the devise is still recording.  I experimented by starting and stopping the recording by pushing the start/stop button.  In some instances the recording stopped, in others, it didn't.  Must depend on the "Mode" the device is in, however, there is no way to tell what mode the devise is in, as, the "flashing" lights do not change when the "mode"button is pushed.  When first connected to my computer, it appears to work ok as a webcam, but I didn't need a web cam, I needed a portable video recorder that was reliable.  Since the lights that show activation never change, it has proven to be less than reliable.

Reviews.Title: Mini DV MD80 DVR, Good little carema
Reviews.Author: Ronald Johnson
Reviews.Content: Product would not turn on. after having it plugged into the wall. I plugged it into the pc via usb port and charged it over night. Works great now. When charging you will see both red and blue lights are on at same time. Good videos on you tube describing functions. Better picture then I hoped. Picture quality was better than an old camera had. I bought another one recently. Kids love to play with it and easy to take on bike rides or put in you care. I believe it records for about an hour on standard recording.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: IslandRacer
Reviews.Content: Works great, didn't get the CD but I'll download drivers elsewhere. The instructions aren't that bad and if you google or youtube this thing, there is a lot of info available out there for it. For less than $20, I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Does not include microSD card
Reviews.Author: Brian Raab
Reviews.Content: The amazon order says it includes a 4gb card.  The actual pacakging says it includes a 2gb card, the unhappy reality is that includes no card at all.  This obviosly increases the end cost of the product.

Reviews.Title: I've never been able to use it.
Reviews.Author: Cadet
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of this cameras. But none of them worked. I don't know if it's a good camera. But one thing is sure, I will never order again an electronic product from Hong Kong neither Taiwan.

Reviews.Title: Lasted one day...
Reviews.Author: Lydia A. Krasilnikova
Reviews.Content: Like I said, it lasted one day, then died... Don't waste your time and money on this junk, find something else.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for....
Reviews.Author: Tony decker
Reviews.Content: For under $20 this camera does what it should, but not much more. The image quailty is less than impressive, but not horrible, as if the field of view for the lens. If you want to capture the full body of a normal height person (6ft), you have to be a good 15ft+ away. The "alloy" case it's made of is what most people refer to as plastic which is not necessarly bad. The AEE brand camera like this comes with a metal body, but if you are looking for weight savings(think R/C Plane/Helo) this could be a huge plus. The function lights are also less than impressive as the three slots on the top barely let the light through. The blue is visible, but the red that tells you when it's recording is barely visible and you have to look hard to see it. Again, this might not be a bad thing if you are going to use covertly. Over all, for $20 it's not a bad invesetment and does work just don't expect it to have great image qualit. One good thing about this camera is it comes with ample mounts. A bracket to clip on, a stand that can be hard mounted, and a rubber protective sleve and wrist strap.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Driven "Ernest Martel"
Reviews.Content: swallowed mini disk and really broke when tried to retrieve it. in trash now. don,t waste your money. this is the truth.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: william dennison
Reviews.Content: its not bad. pretty durable too. has not broke yet, and if it does ill get another one for 15 bucks :)

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Brent Newman "brentucky"
Reviews.Content: great for video survaliance. alsi for recording bike rides or car travels. a must for all in the home for security

Reviews.Title: didn't work very long
Reviews.Author: Randy Smith
Reviews.Content: When it worked picture quality was good but it didn't last long, before it stopped working! will try something else.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: António Moura
Reviews.Content: I will return the camera because after full charge it shuts down after a few seconds of recording. I tryed several times and always the same

Reviews.Title: Good So Far
Reviews.Author: Darrin
Reviews.Content: So far Good!  I'm trying to figure out how to put it on the voice activated mode.  Could use better instructions but after searching the internet I found some helpful links.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: orion "orion"
Reviews.Content: Item came with all its parts thrown in a box and there was NO MicroSD card anywhere to be found. There was an tiny bag which was ripped open where I assume it was. And the stand is broken.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with the DVR and seller
Reviews.Author: gh6762
Reviews.Content: Received mine today and it did have the 4GB micro sd card already in the micro slot and everything was included as advertised. Put a small charge on it and video was more than adequate for the investment and size. The instructions are hard to understand and read because the print is extremely small but a handy magnifier solved that. The CD didnt do anything when I installed in the cdrom and my puter could not find anything in the cdrom, but once I plugged in the USB for the charge WIN7 picked it up and loaded the driver. Maybe cuz I'm running 64bit system. The camera seems to get warm when charging which I hope is normal, dont want to over charge. Overall satisfied with the shipping which was pretty quick and the product. Hope the unit will last and I cant complain for a $10.19 investment to my door.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: It works as described but the battery lasts less than an hour. I don't have any complains for the price though.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Harleyolic
Reviews.Content: This camera does not do well when not kept steady.  Difficult to aim as it apparentaly has a zoomed in lense with no monitor screen.  Hard to see the little red record lite and button is so small you don't know if you have pushed it or not.  Software shows error and will not load on my VISTA windows.  Otherwise, I am pleased with it and would still recommend this to those not needing a high quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Brian Covil
Reviews.Content: I have another one that has a metal or die cast housing.  This one appears to be made only from plastic.  I do not care for it.

Reviews.Title: Mini DV MD80 DVR Video Camera w/4GB MicroSD
Reviews.Author: pi22356
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of these units for spouses business use. Shipment arrived very quickly.SD cards were pre-installed by seller.Spouses Office computers were recently upgraded to windows 8 Pro. Some of the Windows 8 PC would recognize cameras when attached via USB and then would stop and not recognized them again.Perhaps seller can advise how and where to obtain a Windows 8 Driver as no Drivers shipped with units?We were able to fully charge units via Windows 8 USB Connection as no other AC connector was provided in the shipment.We updated the "Tag".txt ANSI file via removing SD Cards from units and inserting them directly to Windows 8 PC in a SD Card Reader..so proper date and time as displayed now. We are able to view and listen to AVI recordings from the units using an external SD Card Reader. I would imagine that can be fixed with a windows 8 driver?Instructions that come with units are type out in broken english, but one can piece it together via the instructions and many you tube videos out there.All in all, Windows 8 driver issues aside we are happy with the units and would recommend them as a very inexpensive way of capturing good quality AVI audio/video.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective alternative to "Spy Gear"
Reviews.Author: J. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I've seen the negative reviews about this product, but I've had no issues with the one I received. For the price its well worth it. Price out some of the kids "Spy Gear" products and this camera is an inexpensive and fun alternative to those (in my opinion) overpriced toys. My son attached this to his remote control truck and made some real cool little videos with it.

Reviews.Title: Okay in Some ways
Reviews.Author: Zuhayr Sarker
Reviews.Content: I just got this a few days ago, and I have to say that if you want a camera on the rim of your shirt or the bottom of an R/C airplane, this is great for any spying. It feels really comfortable and It looks pretty sleek. Comparing to many other Spy Cameras, this really rocks. And it's fallen on the ground more than 5 times but still works really good, so your camera should not be messed as any rocking around during shipping will cause no damage unless it is heavily serious which is rather rare and very unlikely.Well I probably chose this particular rating because I guess this camera has got a lot of cool stuff in it, but at the same time a lot of disadvantages. The camera is quite small ranging at a 5.5 cm length, 2.5 cm width, and is 2 cm in height, and is at a pretty good size. It does look a bit cool, and has a smooth feel to it, but still is annoying at times. The USB is at the bottom which does really annoy me when I try to make it stand vertically, even on the stands, but I don't really care about it. The camera does come with good accessories but don't fall for the trick that mentions it comes with a 4GB Micro SD card. It really doesn't and that is just annoying. Another thing to watch out for is the fact that it is not the real version of the MD80. I've tried to use it as a webcam, but that doesn't really work. There is NO drivers for this MD80 which really stinks in some ways. But I have to say, the fake one probably has better video and sound quality, though I just can't get the MD80 to get pictures yet, which doesn't REALLY bother me, but still makes me feel bad. But other than that, I've got to say that this is one of the coolest camera's I've ever seen for it's size, shape, portability, and usefulness. This isn't a must-buy, but is definitely one of the coolest things ever in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: It does what it says mic is alittle to noisy but works for me and whst i need just fine

Reviews.Title: not very good camera
Reviews.Author: RCDC
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera to use while riding 4 wheeler's. got it in and tryed it out and the video was graining and jitter, and disclored couldnt see what was on video. I called to get a refund but they said i had a bad camera and they would send out a new one, got it in and its the same as old one, so the camera is useless to me good thing i didnt pay much for it..

Reviews.Title: Pay for trash get trash
Reviews.Author: TX LE
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting a deal with this and found out the hard way when it recorded 2 times 3 minutes each time and then would not turn on after that!

Reviews.Title: 3 strikes and you are out
Reviews.Author: Pissed off
Reviews.Content: I READ SOMWHERE WHEN A PERSON TYPES IN CAPITAL LETTERS IT MEANS THEY ARE YELLING. LISTEN TO ME ROAR!!!! I AM SURE THERE ARE LAWS AGAINST FALSE ADVERTISING. THIS IS THE THIRD TIME YOU HAVE REPLACED THIS JUNK MINI CAM. I HAVE ASKED YOU TO CHECK TO MAKE SURE THAT THE ....... THING WORKS BEFORE SENDING, AND WHERE IS 4/GB MICROSD CARD? NOW WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO, SEND ME ANOTHER ONE THAT DOES NOT WORK?

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: chuckbobuck
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera for the price and it takes good sound and video too. The instructions are in Chinglish, so you might as well toss them. At first I thought the camera had shipped without the micro SD card, but found it taped to the inner packaging. I connected the camera to my computer to charge it and tried to use it during the charging. Don't, it will only frustrate you. I managed to lock up the camera and it appeared dead. At this point you need to walk away and give the camera time to reset. Once it is fully charged you can take a video. Disconnect from the USB device. Hold down the power until the leds flash then release it. When the flashing stops press the record button on top to start and then again to stop. To view your video connect to a computer via USB and locate the camera as a drive. The files should be there. You can also remove the micro SD card and view the card as a drive. Once you are able to view the videos you will want to change the time and date. You do this by editing the TAG.TXT file in the root directoy of the micro SD card. The file data needs to be in text format as follows "2013-11-03 20:32:00  TAG. ". "Year-Month-Day Hour:Minute:Second  TAG. ". You can edit via the USB connection or directly on the micro SD. With the camera disconnected and the card installed turn the power on and off twice. This will set to the time to the new file and you are ready to rock-and-roll. The camera comes with 3 different mounts and a neck strap. It is well worth the price and the overall quality is nice.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these thinking they were the AEE MD80's I had heard about, they arent. Neither one will continue recording for more than a few minutes then cuts off. Can barely see the instructions and look like they were written by an 8 year old. Total junk.

Reviews.Title: My second MD80 and rebuy analysis.
Reviews.Author: TALONCRITERIUM
Reviews.Content: This is my second MD80. The first one performed so well like $80 plus cameras and for the harsh duty that I got the same one again. The video is too hd good plus the motion with a class 10 write speed sd card. This new cam looks the same and the same packaging. No charge and took some quick shots with several seconds of charging. The video is like before with the came with the price sd card. It's good enough but has some jounce motion to it but free. I think low charge and no sound in protect mode. Even if so it's so cheap and keep it but needs more charge. This type of buy like gray legal market is highly tempting to get for performance at a super price and sometimes better than US factory. Choose carefully and get a super deal. Understand may some have tech support problems and warranty if from another country market. Usually low instruction but great deal. You should get a few of these for less than battery price. This unit looks like can be modified. Disclaimed: own risk. The battery life may be extended due to 2 red and black wire terminals to the battery but has quick look 2 chips on the battery. If so may not work battery boost splicer, due to chip specific requirement (some sort of voltage feedback loop regulatory and diode function  to charge mode). If yours wears out, may try it to replace battery with exact voltage and esp. amperage or slight lower. The usb connector I think will not hold a same voltage phone booster battery pack because will trigger a charging mode like cable and the cam will not take shots but just charge. Looks like chip based battery is boost proof  unless super tech man with equipment. Mine lasted nearly 1 year. Take careful charging procedures and watch out for this type battery memory and this cams specific charging requirements. Don't overcharge to hot. If charge well usually last near 2hours cut and dry and will run my 4gb 10c sd fully even until didn't work at default 3.69 GB. Maybe just led replacement problem or the battery died. Great performing product like in the gopro shots class with good speed sd card. I usually don't charge more than 4 hours with my Bluetooth headset 5vdc charger compatible. Usb I usually charge more than at least 8 hours (Disclaimered). Test shot length and increase increment usb charging times. Test few or else battery memory may. Just opened up the box.Be very careful which seller you from. Similar to a scam. Defective arrive and no provisional for return shipping. Total shipping return loss and no exchange. Be very weary of similar shady types.

Reviews.Title: good camera but sloppy packing
Reviews.Author: Johnny bad news
Reviews.Content: Brought 4 camera when I checked all the boxes there were no cameras in any of the boxes just the accessory, called the dealer ask where my cameras ? after a week wondering where my cameras were I pulled all the boxes out and double checked them still no cameras.  They were just thrown in side the bag, they were so small I missed them they should been pack in the boxes poor shipping .I would recommend you glue in the camera clip pin, Lost the pin 3 times lucky I found It in the house, I just put a little dab of silicone glue on each side of the pin and  lite lock tight on the small nut that hold the clip.Updatehard to know where your lens is pointing. I did away with the clip, when you use the clip on your clothes it just hangs there some times pointing at the ground I glued on a strip of velco,on the back of the camera and  cut a black sheet of plastic from a tv dinner dish for my shirt pocket and glued a oposite velco strip and stick the camera in side your shit pocket and it not floping around and you have a little better control

Reviews.Title: Difficult to use, doesn't hold a charge.
Reviews.Author: Sean Flater
Reviews.Content: Setting the recording mode on this thing is annoying, and my camera glitches and forgets how to work periodically. It also seems not to hold a charge even when turned-off after a couple hours off a power source. All-in-all I find the thing unusable.Mine, however DID come with the 4-gig micro SD card others complain they didn't receive, which I would be glad about if the camera was usable.

Reviews.Title: Missing MicroSD Card
Reviews.Author: Wonderful "Sylvia"
Reviews.Content: I should have heeded the reviews before I purchased this item. Just like the others, this one was missing the MicroSD card.  Since I ordered it for a Christmas gift, I didnt find out until recently that it was missing.  Live and Learn - and had to purchase a replacement Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: Able Provider is full of it!!
Reviews.Author: R. L. Taylor
Reviews.Content: The seller did not provide the  4gb microSD card as advertised!! Also lacking installation disc! I guess it's not that much of a problem as I can use the camera without installing any drivers (might not work for older comps!!)

Reviews.Title: I would rate higher if it came with sd card as advertised
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: The camera is identical to a previously purchased one from Hong Kong, but that one came with a micro SD memory card. This was advertised as coming with a 4 GB micro SD card, but didn't have one with it on arrival.  Vendor has promised to ship one ASAP, but haven't seen it as yet and have bumped them twice with promises in return that it was "on the way:.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: chaka
Reviews.Content: don't buy. doesn't work. all lights work but records nothing. not impressed! learned the hard way I guess. just another cheap product from china!

Reviews.Title: Just got 5 of them
Reviews.Author: Takashi
Reviews.Content: Just got 5 cameras and not one has the 4GB mico SD card that is advertized.  Good thing I bought some in case they didn't work well.  The instructions are nearly unreadable and you have to try different things to get them to work.  As for sound and picture, not bad for the price.  They are going to work ok for the intent.

Reviews.Author: amde
Reviews.Content: Not sure if it is working or not because when I put sd card power is  down  so I'm not sure if it work any more

Reviews.Title: not complete AND defective
Reviews.Author: Letkel
Reviews.Content: No problem getting an Amazon rebate on this. The package did NOT include the Micro sd card listed. The Camera on/off button did NOT work, the battery would not accept a charge.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!  DO NOT BUY!  Junk hardware plus software supplied had a trojan horse program!
Reviews.Author: MLO9
Reviews.Content: Yeah, I should have known better based on recent reviews of this product but went ahead and bought one anyway.Like others, I charged the unit overnight with the supplied charger.  Tried powering it on and nothing.  No indicator lights...not even a quick flash of the indicator lights.Then attempted to connect to my computer.  As expected, the device wasn't recognized.  It came with a mini-CD (or DVD) so I attempted to install the drivers.  Within seconds after the setup program started to install the software, my anti-virus software flagged a known trojan horse program.Immediately cancelled the installation, removed the software, and ran AV scan on my computer.Everything is now where it belongs:  The trash can.I realize Amazon has thousands and thousands of products but this is unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Find another product but do not buy this one
Reviews.Author: Steve Brewer
Reviews.Content: The instructions are unbelievable and impossible to read. Someone in China must have thought they could read and write English but they do not even come close. I tried to use and could not get it to work. I strongly recommend not wasting your money.

Reviews.Title: stopped working during the first ride....
Reviews.Author: R. Tkatch
Reviews.Content: I tried this in the house and it worked ok... picture shows the camera is upside down in there because the movie it showed was upside down... tried it out on the road today, seemed to be working at the start but when I got back, it was off and I now have it plugged into my computer to see what it did get and the thing is dead.... useless piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: No battery life!!!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Clement "Deal Dishing Mom"
Reviews.Content: The battery sucks...Last one hour if lucky. I was looking for a motion detection camera and this popped up. Not a motion detection camera. Do not buy a waste of $10.00...says it will record while plugged in... The poorly translated instructions are hard to follow and make no sense.

Reviews.Title: Cost says it all but fun little toy
Reviews.Author: rben
Reviews.Content: Poor quality images, a bit difficult to learn to use but cheap and fun to play with. Works great with windows

Reviews.Title: Good camera without 4gb card
Reviews.Author: big c
Reviews.Content: Place order thinking i would get what i asked for now product is here without the 4gb card. WHAT IS IN THE PRODUCT TITLE? the costumer service either cant read or r just dumb. i left feedback that said i will remove my review if they sent me the 4gb card or money back. Still no card nor money back. They wont be in business for long.

Reviews.Title: Never function
Reviews.Author: Super Roque
Reviews.Content: mini camera never worked ... achieved record but the image is dark and only heard good sound. not bring the microsd .... very bad condition.

Reviews.Title: Barata, pero de baja calidad
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: La camara se siente muy corriente y plástica. Es algo complicada de usar, el software que trae no es muy amigable.Por otro lado, el precio es bajo y trae varios accesorios.The camera feels very current and plastic. It's complicated to use, the software that comes not very friendly.On the other hand, the price is low and brings several accessories.

Reviews.Title: Great Instructions
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I should have read the signs, no brand name and the instructions translated in to English via Google Translate.I can't work out how to use it but I'll keep trying.

Reviews.Title: im pissed
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: when i got it it came withour the 4gb microsb and im pissed also it came really early but still now memory card

Reviews.Title: bad camera
Reviews.Author: lorenzo
Reviews.Content: buy this camera to record an acceptable time, but when I turn just half-hour of recording, and charge the battery last long. has good picture and good sound but I need something better than this.

Reviews.Title: Crap!
Reviews.Author: annwvn
Reviews.Content: It was a piece of crap. I returned it, What a waste of time. Watch out for cheap electronics from China.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!!!
Reviews.Author: Joel M. Palmer
Reviews.Content: This product was a big disappointment.  It's much smaller than represented in the photograph, and I don't seed how anyone could really use this product.  It's my fault..."caveat emptor".  I didn't do my research (as I usually do), but I expected more from Amazon as I usually get quality products from them.  I'd like to send it back or is it too late?thoroughly dissappointed---JMPPS---I would have given it a zero, but the system doesn't allow it!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Small & Portable, easy recording / monitoring.
With PC camera function, enjoy life on the network.
Maximum support expansion cards 16G (TF Card NOT Included).
USB charging data cable:connect computer&video; upload / download.
Operation System: Windows 98SE/2000/Me/XP/Vista, Mac OS10.4
ProductInfo.Name: Mini DV Md80 DVR Video Camera Microsd, supports upto 4GB   (Black)
